interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magic Bax Earring Lifters - 2 Pairs of Adjustable Hypoallergenic Earring Lifts (2 Pairs of 18K Gold Plated Earring Backs) As Seen on TV
Review Date: 2018/02/21
Store: Allstar Innovations
Product Description: ['• Get an instant earring lift with Magic Bax Earring Lifters • Helps those with bad piercings, stretched lobes and heavy earrings • Hypoallergenic and Perfect For Post Earrings • Simply slide the earring post into the Magic Bax, just like any earring back! Designed to be comfortable for all day wear • Magic Bax are adjustable to fit earring posts of various sizes']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Sterling Silver', 'Color': 'Set of 4 18K Gold Plated Sterling Silver', 'Style': 'Basic- 2 Pairs 18K Gold Plated', 'Brand': 'Allstar Innovations', 'Item Weight': '0.15 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 4.17 x 0.94 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '30632', 'UPC': '740275049303', 'Manufacturer': 'Allstar Innovations'}
Review Text: These are made with a clever design to ensure you are putting them on correctly.  According to the enclosed instructions, you always wear them so that the heart part of the backs are on top when you slide them onto the post of your earrings.  This insures that the weight of the earring pulls the heart against your ear which, in turn, counterbalances the earring and holds it securely against your ear.  They're really lightweight, but they work well.  I tried them on my heaviest earrings to see just how securely these backs hold and they do not disappoint.  Even using them with lighter earrings you can tell they are held much more tightly and upright against your ear.  They are designed so you can tighten or loosen the clasp on them so they're adjusted just the way you want them.  A friend gave me a set of these for Christmas and I liked them so I bought more for myself and a couple more sets for my sisters to try.  I'm happy that this set is 18K gold plated sterling silver so I won't have any problems with allergies.  They are a great idea and they have a very pretty finish.
Review Title: Very pretty finish
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LUCINE LASHES MINK COLLECTION -"Bia" - False Mink Eyelashes - Natural False Eyelashes for Thickness, Length and Volume - Reusable, Non-Irritating and Easy to Apply (Black)
LUCINE LASHES
{'Brand': 'LUCINE LASHES', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 2.3 x 0.6 inches', 'UPC': '707129687159'}
These eyelashes are very soft and natural feeling, with a sturdy base to them.  I don't really care for base that looks like a thick layer of eyeliner but this one is kind of a medium thickness so it's okay.  However, I have very thick hair and eyelashes that have gotten thinner over time and these lashes are so thick they look really fake on me.  They look okay, but I don't think they'll ever be my "go to" lash.  Still, it's obvious they're made with care and the quality appears to be very good if you're looking for thick lashes.
Quality appears to be very good

These are made with a clever design to ensure you are putting them on correctly.  According to the enclosed instructions, you always wear them so that the heart part of the backs are on top when you slide them onto the post of your earrings.  This insures that the weight of the earring pulls the heart against your ear which, in turn, counterbalances the earring and holds it securely against your ear.  They're really lightweight, but they work well.  I tried them on my heaviest earrings to see just how securely these backs hold and they do not disappoint.  Even using them with lighter earrings you can tell they are held much more tightly and upright against your ear.  They are designed so you can tighten or loosen the clasp on them so they're adjusted just the way you want them.  A friend gave me a set of these for Christmas and I liked them so I bought more for myself and a couple more sets for my sisters to try.  I'm happy that this set is 18K gold plated sterling silver so I won't have any problems with allergies.  They are a great idea and they have a very pretty finish.
Very pretty finish
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user continues to favor natural-looking beauty products and has recently shown interest in accessories that enhance comfort and functionality, indicating a broadening interest in products that complement their beauty routine.

- **Quality Consciousness:** The user demonstrates a strong appreciation for high-quality materials, now extending this interest to hypoallergenic options that provide comfort and durability, further emphasizing their need for non-irritating products.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** The user maintains a preference for medium thickness in eyelash bases, reflecting a desire for balance in beauty products. Their recent purchase suggests an interest in enhancing existing accessories while ensuring a seamless integration with their overall aesthetic.

- **Concerns:** Having thicker natural eyelashes and hair, the user exhibits a preference for products that avoid an artificial appearance. The selection of hypoallergenic, adjustable backs for earrings aligns with their inclination toward comfort and compatibility with their natural features.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user values both functionality and style, looking for beauty and fashion accessories that can enhance their experience. They exhibit a discerning approach in their selections, ensuring products meet their specific needs for quality and comfort without compromising their natural look.

Overall, the summary reflects a trend toward valuing quality, comfort, and practicality in beauty and accessory products while maintaining a thoughtful consideration of personal attributes and aesthetics.
